entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
